ownerName.description: The owner of the GitHub repository.

repoName.description: The name of the GitHub repository.

orgProjectName.description: The name of the GitHub organization project. This is a V2 project.

releaseTypes.description: The list of release types. Example: preview or production.

githubTokenEnvVarName.description: The name of the environment variable that contains the GitHub token.

versionFilePath.description: The relative path to the file that contains the version number. Both JSON and csproj files are supported.

versionJSONKeyPath.description: The path to the version number in the JSON file. Only used if the file is a JSON file.
